title: Skirt
description: large; dark; wrap style; accordian pleated; 6-1/2\" blue waistband; lower 7\" of doubled, coarse cotton; center section of batik, geometric pattern and colorful, appliqued pattern in gold, green, red and blue; no ties
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
